subject: Steroids
Testosterone
Weight Lifting
Drug Abuse and Traffic
lead_paragraph: The German and Polish police arrested 10 people that they say were part of an organization that supplied anabolic steroids and human growth hormone to bodybuilders across Europe.
snippet: The German and Polish police arrested 10 people that they say were part of an organization that supplied anabolic steroids and human growth hormone to bodybuilders across Europe.
